name: BillWilldered
description:
Billwillder, a slime creature who is split in two. Bill, the red side and Will, the blue side. Bill, an alcoholic slime who loves to drink boozes. Will, a greedy slime who gets easily distracted by gold. Both sides of the slime have their wants and now you and a friend must fight over control and try to grab the most of their desire. You only got a certain amount of time whoever grabs the most of their side's wants wins. 

Controls-

Left Stick- Move

Right Stick- Move Arm

Trigger(Hold)- Grab

Move Arm all the way down to score item

Developed for the Global Game Jam 2022, at Dakota State University.

Team Leader- Jacob Hoge

Programmers- Jacob Hoge, Ethan Reichel

Artist- Daniel Wurzburger, David Enersen
